Name: Kleem Organics Neck & Decollete Firming Cream
Label:
Ingredients from packaging:
Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Aqua, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Isopropyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus Oil, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Simmondsia Chinesis Oil, Panthenol, Tocopherol Acetate, Camelia Sinensis Extract, Resina Propoli Extract, Xanthane Gum, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Rose Ether, Ethylhexylglycerin
Directions from packaging:
Apply your cream in upward-sweeping motions starting from the base of your neck to discourage sagging. Use a super-light hand when applying your neck cream. Use every morning and night.
Warnings from packaging:
Discontinue use if any negative reactions occur. Avoid contact with eyes. If that happens rinse immediately with water. This product may increase skin s sensitivity to the sun and increase burning. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure. Keep out of the reach of children. For external use only.
Certification: EWG Verified,Product's animal testing policies,PETA Cruelty-free Companies
